title: 10% Discount Yes but 10% Tax No!
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/OvvRJApR30-offer.jpg?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Once again you are at shopping. "},{"type":"text","text":"Is this your first time ?","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" This time the offer is little different. You buy something and end up at counter which states the following two offers :"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. You will receive 10% discount on your price but after the discount you need to pay 10% tax to the government.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. You will have to pay 10% tax to the government and then you will get 10% discount on the total price including tax.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You can choose any one of the above offers. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Which one will lead you to profit ???"}]}]}

title: 10 dots
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consider this regular triangular lattice:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/oAPpFIhAea-os3am6byxt-10dots.jpg?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If three dots are chosen at random, what is the probability that they will form the vertices of an equilateral triangle?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the probability is given by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{a}{b}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are coprime positive integers, express your answer as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Image credit","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":":  http://wearekalia.blogspot.com"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There are 15 ways to get an equilateral triangle:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9 unit triangles"}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3 triangles of side length 2"}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 triangle of side length 3"}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2 triangles in the middle (like the one below)"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/NDVqoAAS9n-10dots_answer.jpg?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"And, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\binom{10}{3} = 120"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ways to choose 3 dots."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, the probability is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{15}{120} = \dfrac{1}{8}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+8 = \boxed{9}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: Ten for ten
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the set of all "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-digit integers that can be composed from the integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,2, ...., 9,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (repetition is allowed). Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the product of the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" digits of an element "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that has been chosen uniformly and at random. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the probability that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\lfloor 1000P \rfloor"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Details and Assumptions","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":":"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"As an explicit example: if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N = 1186734452"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" associated with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 \times 1 \times 8 \times 6 \times 7\times 3\times 4\times 4\times 5\times 2 = 161280"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For the product "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to be divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" at least one of the digits must be divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", i.e., must be one of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2, 4, 6, 8"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and at least one of digits must be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It will be easier, though, to first count the number of elements that are not divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4^{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" elements of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that have no digits that are either even or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Next, as there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8^{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" elements that do not have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as a digit, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8^{10} - 4^{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" elements that have an even digit but no "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Finally, as there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5^{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" elements that do not have an even digit, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5^{10} - 4^{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" elements that have a "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" but no even digit."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4^{10} + (8^{10} - 4^{10}) + (5^{10} - 4^{10}) = 8^{10} + 5^{10} - 4^{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" elements of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that are not divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" As there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9^{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" elements in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the probability "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that the product "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" associated with a randomly chosen element "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is then"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P = \dfrac{9^{10} - 8^{10} - 5^{10} + 4^{10}}{9^{10}} = 0.689553827...."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\lfloor 1000*P \rfloor = \boxed{689}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Haha. Well, I guess that much of mathematics is about realizing that two seemingly distinct things are in fact the same. :)

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Very nice question.  I was stuck for a while because I did it the slightly longer way.  I  wondered if I should subtract "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5^{10}-4^{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"  or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \sum_0^{9} 4^n\cdot 5^{9-n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" from the original quantity.   After thinking for a while, I realized they were the same thing :3 lol.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: (10) - Incoming
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\text{E}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is on line segment "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\text{DA}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of convex quadrilateral "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\text{ABCD}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" such that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\text{EA} = \\text{AB}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\text{DE} = \\text{CD} = \\text{BC} = \\text{CA}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". What is the measurement of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\widehat{\\text{ABC}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in degrees?"}]}]}

title: 10% increase decrease
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The price of a table was increased by 10% last day. But on the next day it was reduced by 10%. How much percentage difference came in the price of the table....?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note: If the answer is 5% type the answer as 5."}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

diff=x-0.99x=0.01x=1% of x

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"lets the price is X"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"so last day the price was increased 10% and price become X+X*0.1= 1.1X"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Next the price decrease 10% and the price become 1.1X-1.1X*0.1=0.99X"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So overall the is reduced by X-0.99X=0.01X or 1%"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This can be easily done using poylogarithms,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"polylog[-10,2] = -204495126"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"But since the sum can never be negative,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence,"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{204495126}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x/(1-x) = x+x^2+x^3...."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"do this 10 times"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"diff. w.r.t x then multiply both sides by x.keep doing this and then substitute x=0.5"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 10 jelly beans
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/JrAsOhRi2F-group-2-1.svg?width=200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I have a bag of 10 jelly beans.  There are two each of five different colors.  These jelly beans taste extra delicious if you eat two of different colors at the same time.  So here's how I will eat them:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I will pick two at random without looking into the bag.  If they are the same color, I will put them back and pick again until they don't match.  If they are different colors, I will eat them (yum!)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If I continue to eat them in this way, what is the probability that the last pair of jelly beans will be different colors?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the probability can be expressed as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \dfrac ab"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are coprime positive integers, submit your answer as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Call the starting situation "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5d0s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for the 5 pairs of duplicate colors and 0 single colors.  The number of s is always even.  We seek to arrive at "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0d2s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and not "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1d0s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The probability of 'winning' for some simpler situations:  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(2d0s)=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" because we won't eat two of the same color.  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(0d[2n]s)=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" because if they are all different colors we will always win."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(3d0s)=P(1d2s)=\frac{4}{5}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" because we start with 4 jelly beans.  There are 6 ways of choosing 2, but 1 will be rejected.  We win as long as we don't pick the matching pair and do pick one of the 4 unmatched pairs."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(4d0s)=P(2d2s)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is harder.   There are 6 jelly beans and 15 ways of picking 2, but 2 of these will be rejected as a matching pair, leaving 13 possible outcomes."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 of these (picking the two singles) brings us to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2d0s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{13}*1=\frac{1}{13}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8 of these (picking a single and one of a double) bring us to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1d2s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which we found above.  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{8}{13}*\frac{4}{5}=\frac{32}{65}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4 of these (picking one of each of the remaining doubles)  bring us to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0d4s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{4}{13}*1=\frac{4}{13}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So the total "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(4d0s)=\frac{1}{13}+\frac{32}{65}+\frac{4}{13}=\frac{57}{65}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We will also need "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(1d4s)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  I'll just give the calculation: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{8}{14}*1+\frac{6}{14}*\frac{4}{5}=\frac{32}{35}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now to tackle the answer.  The first pick from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5d0s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must bring us to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3d2s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which is 8 jelly beans.  The next pull can happen in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8C2-3=25"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ways."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 of these (picking the two singles) brings us to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3d0s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{25}*\frac{4}{5}=\frac{4}{125}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"12 of these (picking a single and one of a double) brings us to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2d2s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{12}{25}*\frac{57}{65}=\frac{684}{1625}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"12 of these (picking one each of the remaining doubles) brings us to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1d4s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{12}{25}*\frac{32}{35}=\frac{384}{875}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So the total "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(5d0s)=\frac{4}{125}+\frac{684}{1625}+\frac{384}{875}=\frac{10144}{11375}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and so the answer is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10144+11375=\boxed{21519}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Very neat solution, nice job!

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: $10 Large Pizza
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The local pizzeria is advertising a special where you can get a large pizza with up to 3 different toppings for only $10. If the pizzeria offers 11 different toppings, how many different types of pizza can you get in this special deal?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Details and assumptions","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A double topping of pepperoni does not qualify for the special $10 price. The 3 toppings must be different."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"In America, pizzas are purchased according to what toppings are selected on the pizza, as opposed to a type of pizza (say Meat-Lovers Supreme)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The order of toppings on a pizza does not matter."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You can get a pizza with no toppings."}]}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Agreed. Why would I want to purchase a pizza with no topping?

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Right, missed "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{11 \choose 0}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Question should be amended.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Yes, a pizza with no topping still counts as a pizza, though the question should have probably made this clearer.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If there can be up to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings, there can be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0, 1, 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ways with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ways with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" topping: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ways with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\binom{11}{2}=55"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ways with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\binom{11}{3}=165"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+11+55+165=232"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Well, given the restrictions (11 types of toppings; up to 3 different toppings), you can have four different types of pizzas (pizzas, not toppings!)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"orderedList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A pizza with all 3 different toppings"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A pizza with 2 different toppings"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A pizza with only 1 topping"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A pizza with no toppings (Horrified Gasp)"}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So, the total number of combinations ends up being: 11C0 + 11C1 + 11C2 + 11C3 = 232"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Horrified Gasp indeed!

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We note that a pizza can have either 0, 1, 2, or 3 toppings, chosen from 11, so we merely have to sum the appropriate combinations, such that we obtain:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" {11 \choose 0}+{11 \choose 1}+{11 \choose 2}+{11 \choose 3}=\boxed{232} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since the order of toppings dont matter, so we take here combination to find out the number of ways (not permutation). The pizza ordered can have no topping or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" topping or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings at most so as to avail the special deal. Now, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" different possible toppings that can be added to the pizza."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Number of different pizzas that can have no topping "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=11C0=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Number of different pizzas that can have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" topping "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=11C1=11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Number of different pizzas that can have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=11C2=\frac{11\times 10}{2}=11\times 5 = 55"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Number of different pizzas that can have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=11C3=\frac{11\times 10\times 9}{3\times 2}=11\times 15 = 165"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So, total number of different pizzas that can be bought "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=1+11+55+165=\boxed{232}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The pizza  can have"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Three toppings: From "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 11 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" {11 \choose 3} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ways."}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Two toppings: From "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 11 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" {11 \choose 2} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ways."}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"One topping: From "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 11 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" {11 \choose 1} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ways."}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Zero toppings: From "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 11 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" toppings, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" {11 \choose 0} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ways."}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus, our final answer is"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" {11 \choose 3}  + {11 \choose 2} + {11 \choose 1} + {11 \choose 0} = \boxed{232} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You can either choose "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0, 1, 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" unique toppings to qualify for the offer. Therefore, the total number of pizzas available is,
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{11 \choose 0} + {11 \choose 1} + {11 \choose 2} + {11 \choose 3} = \fbox{232}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Pizza could have 0 toppings, 1 toppings, 2 toppings or 3 toppings among the 11: 
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" C(11,0)+ C(11,1)+C(11,2)+C(11,3)=1+11+66+165=232 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            I hope you meant to say "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\binom{11}{2} = 55"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and not "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"66"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ... looks like you punched in the wrong keys in haste

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}
